data.title: Why aren't Asian Americans allowed to serve in the military?
data.meta_description: Answer (1 of 2): That's just horseshit! You need to go study history. There are a lot of Asian Americans who have served in the US military. They serve even now. There was an entire company of Japanese Americans who served in WWII in Europe and they were highly decorated. Try going on Facebook an...
